    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"

>
[Accelerating Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1671) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
devotion spell ([_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395))

</column>

---

Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy. A creature that recovers Hit Points from your [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) gains a +10-foot status bonus to its Speed until the end of its next turn.
